N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 370.7 - Safety net assistance supplementation

State Regulations

Safety net assistance must not be denied or discontinued
solely on the basis that the applicant/recipient is in receipt of
SSI. Notes
